text: Ray Ceresino (April 24, 1929 - May 1, 2015) was a Canadian ice hockey left winger. He played for the Toronto Maple Leafs of the NHL. He was born in Port Arthur, Ontario. ==References== * Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: Ray Ceresino
